name: Milcery
description: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

abilities.name: Aroma Veil
abilities.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
abilities.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
